io.github.goodees.ese.core.async

Class AsyncEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.goodees.ese.core.EventSourcedEntity
      • io.github.goodees.ese.core.async.AsyncEntity

  • public abstract class AsyncEntity
extends EventSourcedEntity
    An entity whose request execution is asynchronous, a result of composing CompletableFutures. The execution of request is implemented in method execute(Request).

    The runtime for this entity needs to extends from AsyncEventSourcingRuntime.

    To emit an event the execute code will call one of persistAndUpdate methods - persistAndUpdate(Event), persistAllAndUpdate(Event[]), persistAllAndUpdate(Collection). These methods will facilitate persisting the events and updating the state. If the persistAndUpdate succeeds, side effects can be chained to returned CompletionStage.

    See Also:
    AsyncEventSourcingRuntime

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected abstract <R extends Request<RS>,RS> CompletionStage<RS> execute(R request)
        Process incoming request, to which the caller expects a response. The implementation should
        • validate the preconditions for the command in the current state, e. g. sending queries to external systems, but not changing the state of external systems
        • prepare events to be generated. The event's entityStateVersion needs to be equal to result of call to EventSourcedEntity.getStateVersion()
        • call persistAndUpdate methods to store the events. EventSourcedEntity.updateState(Event) will be called when persist succeeds
        • chain other stages past the persistAndUpdate call to invoke side effects, like communication that changes state of other parts of the system
        • complete the CompletionStage. EventSourcedEntity.performPostInvocationActions(List, Throwable) will be called by the runtime to allow to perform any request-independent side effects
        Type Parameters:
        R - type of request
        RS - type of response
        Parameters:
        request - request to execute
        Returns:
        Completion stage that will either contain the result, or the exception the call resulted in.
        See Also:
        persistAndUpdate(Event), persistAllAndUpdate(Event[]), persistAllAndUpdate(Collection)

      • persistAndUpdate

        protected <E extends Event> AsyncResult<E> persistAndUpdate(E event)
        Persist an event. After persist is successful the current state will be updated.
        Type Parameters:
        E - type of event
        Parameters:
        event - event to persist
        Returns:
        AsyncResult that completes successfully with the event when persist succeeds. Completes with EventStoreException if it doesn't succeed.

      • persistAllAndUpdate

        @SafeVarargs
protected final <E extends Event> AsyncResult<List<E>> persistAllAndUpdate(E... events)
        Persist multiple events event. After persist is successful the current state will be updated.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
